entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: I just noticed that the project is created and shows up in the project list, and I can get to the settings page after it's been created.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: Clicking the "Create and Continue" button does not cause the error, presumably because it does not forward me to the settings page for the project.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: This also happens in Firefox 30.0 on Ubuntu 14.04.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: This appears to be in all browsers.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: I've finally tracked down what the overall issue with this is. It seems in this version of Redmine, after a new project is created the cached project memberships for the user is not updated. I'll be looking in to whether this is fixed in newer versions of Redmine a little bit, but ultimately submit a patch to our current copy to resolve the issue (not update to a newer version of Redmine; that will be a future task).

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: As far as I can tell without actually standing up and configuring a new instance of Redmine, it looks like this would be an issue with the latest as well.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content:
• Status changed from In Progress to Feedback
  • Assignee set to Jeremy Wright

Posted a fix under SVN, revision 82. Updated the test server, so this should be good to go to verify it's working (which it seems to be on my end).

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content:
Now when I click the Create button, Firefox and Chrome both get stuck waiting for the server. It never redirects to the settings page, the loading indicator(s) just spin forever.

    OS: Ubuntu 14.04

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: I cleared the browser cache on Chrome just to make sure that wasn't the problem. It still says that it's waiting for the server forever.

entry.title: Open Design Engine - Bug #249: Receive 403 Error After Creating New Project
entry.content: I think it getting stuck is some how related to the validation bug fix. When I updated the test server yesterday with that fix it started to hang on new project creation. Oddly, reverting that change didn't seem to fix it. I'll update this ticket when that issue appears to be resolved.
